name: Valley Knights
description:
The sun has stopped rising after a mysterious explosion at the top of an ancient tower. You must gather your wits and survive eternal night in a world driven mad by apocalypse. Every moment counts and every decision comes with consequences in the unforgiving forests of the Vlenfir Valley. Grow, learn, adapt and equip your treasures; but be careful, something worse than death is coming for you.

Key Features

Turn-based Tactics


Plan your moves and lead your heroes to victory with superior tactics.


Engage your foe with a tactics system focused on deep melee interactions like flanking, opportunity attacks, engagement, and competence.


Use morale to terrify foes and bolster allies when their conviction wanes.


Survive encounters with deadly bosses intent on ending your journey.

Roguelike Progression


No one lives forever so make every choice count.


Permanently unlock classes, recipes, and more through encounters and treasure rewards.


Every playthrough features new heroes, along with new enemies to defeat, encounters to discover, and treasure to find

Role-Playing


Earn experience and customize your hero's skills and talents. Add to their repertoir by discovering skill books and manuals throughout the world.


Use what you find or keep it to craft or sell. Every item has value.


The choices you make can change the outcome of every encounter, along with randomized results to make every playthrough different.
